text: I am a Java developer, and I want to start doing projects in Julia. My main interest in Julia come from the ability to prototype quickly. However I new to the Julia ecosystem and I do not know which packages are industry ready to plug and play and not worry about it. Is there a website which can help with that?

elements.text: I am a Java developer, and I want to start doing projects in Julia. My main interest in Julia come from the ability to prototype quickly. However I new to the Julia ecosystem and I do not know which packages are industry ready to plug and play and not worry about it. Is there a website which can help with that?

text:
TBH, best is to post here. "What package should I use for X"
This is the kind of information that is really easy to store in meat.
And useful to, because context matters a lot
